item.description:
Hi Incubators!

I hope you all had a wonderful celebration for Independence Day.

This week we'll continue the celebration with our own fireworks made from improv and exploding into laughter!

We'll be meeting in my backyard again this week to enjoy the warm weather and to check out some ice cream afterwards as well.

Bring a smile and some friends! No improv experience required. We don't bite unless it's a scene about vampires which given the current trend who knows, lol.

Any questiosn or concerns, shoot me an email!

Cheers!

Jason

p.s. just to clarify again, just mosing around to my backyard and I'll be there.
item.name: The Incubator Saga: Improv
